errorPage.description: Something went wrong but don’t worry – your funds are safe. Please try again.

notFoundPage.description: There is no content on this page. It has either moved, or never existed. Try checking the URL for typos, and if that doesn't solve the problem, you can go to <0>link</0> to continue.

fullD2.title: Sovryn is in maintenance mode.
fullD2.description: Follow the social channels linked in the footer for further updates.

transactionStep.customAmountTooltip: Limiting the amount of approved tokens as an additional security measure may result higher fees
transactionStep.unlimitedAmountTooltip: Limiting the amount of approved tokens as an additional security measure may result higher fees
transactionStep.transactionFailedSubtitle: Please close or retry your transaction.

meta.title: Borrow - Sovryn
meta.description: 0% interest loans with Sovryn's Zero protocol. Borrow ZUSD or DLLR against your Bitcoin in a fully decentralized system. Increase your earning potential today.

gettingStartedPopup.title: Put your loan to work
gettingStartedPopup.description: Here are a few ideas for what you can do with your loan:

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Earn BTC by depositing into the Zero stability pool or Sovryn DLLR/RBTC Pool.

lend.title: Lend
lend.description: Earn interest by providing liquidity to the Sovryn lending protocol.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Buy more BTC or other assets using the Sovryn exchange protocol.

bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.description: Convert your loan into popular stablecoins on BSC and Ethereum.

notification.title: Email notifications
notification.description: Receive important alerts about the state of your line of credit and the Zero protocol

errors.ratioWarningInRecovery: Keeping your collateral ratio above {{value}}% can reduce the risk of liquidation in cases of market volatility
errors.ratioErrorInRecovery: Collateral ratio must be ≥ {{value}}% in recovery mode
errors.ratioWarning: Keeping your collateral ratio above {{value}}% can help avoid liquidation under recovery mode
errors.ratioError: Collateral ratio must be at least {{value}}%
errors.ratioDecreased: New collateral ratio must be greater than {{value}}%
errors.balanceTooLow: The collateral amount you're trying to deposit exceeds your balance by {{value}}
errors.collateralTooLow: Collateral balance must be at least {{value}}
errors.withdrawBalanceTooLow: The collateral amount you're trying to withdraw exceeds your trove balance by {{value}}
errors.repayBalanceTooLow: The {{currency}} amount you're trying to repay exceeds your balance by {{value}}
errors.creditBalanceTooLow: The {{currency}} amount you're trying to borrow exceeds your maximum by {{value}}
errors.totalDebtTooLow: The total debt must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}
errors.newTotalDebtTooLow: The new total debt must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}
errors.newCollateralTooLow: Add collateral amount must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}

tx.addCollateralTitle: Add collateral to line of credit
tx.withdrawCollateralTitle: Withdraw collateral from line of credit

debt.tooltip: Amount of debt to add or remove

collateral.tooltip: Amount of collateral to add or remove

labels.disclaimer: I understand my collateral may be liquidated or redeemed if applicable - <0>Learn more</0>

closeCreditLine.title: Select the token you'd like to pay your debt with:
closeCreditLine.error: You need an additional {{amount}} {{token}} in order to close your line of credit.

meta.title: Earn - Sovryn
meta.description: Earn BTC by supplying ZUSD and ensure full collateralization of Zero with the Stability Pool. Join Sovryn's decentralized Zero protocol and start earning now.

earnPage.title: Stability pool
earnPage.subtitle: Earn BTC and SOV by providing liquidity for liquidations
earnPage.subsidiesRewardRateInfo: Calculated using the current subsidies APR, assuming subsidies are compounded daily by the user (gas expenses not included)

form.undercollateralized: Withdrawals disabled – one or more LOCs are undercollateralized

meta.title: Convert - Sovryn
meta.description: Convert between stablecoins on Zero - ZUSD, DOC, and Sovryn DLLR - using the Zero and Mynt protocols. Exchange with ease and convenience.

tabs.receiveInfoText: Transfer BTC from the bitcoin network to your Rootstock address
tabs.sendInfoText: Transfer BTC from the Rootstock network to a specified bitcoin address

receiveInstructions.title: Instructions
receiveInstructions.line1: Only transfer BTC from the bitcoin network
receiveInstructions.line2: Do not send less than the minimum amount
receiveInstructions.line3: Do not send more than the maximum amount
receiveInstructions.line4: Allow up to {{hours}} hrs to process
receiveInstructions.line5: If your transaction takes longer than {{hours}} hrs please <0>create a support ticket</0>

sendInstructions.title: Instructions
sendInstructions.line1: Only transfer BTC to the bitcoin network
sendInstructions.line2: Do not send less than the minimum amount
sendInstructions.line3: Do not send more than the maximum amount
sendInstructions.line4: Allow up to {{hours}} hrs to process
sendInstructions.line5: If your transaction takes longer than {{hours}} hrs please <0>create a support ticket</0>

addressForm.title: Send BTC to this address
addressForm.invalidSignatures: We had an error while trying to verify a deposit address

amountForm.title: Enter amount of Rootstock BTC to send

txDialog.title: Send BTC to the bitcoin network

meta.title: Rewards - Sovryn
meta.description: Claim BTC rewards from Zero's Stability Pool and transfer them to your wallet or active Line of Credit in Sovryn's Zero protocol. Start earning rewards today.

tx.transfer: Transfer rewards to line of credit

meta.title: History - Sovryn
meta.description: Access your history for Line of Credit, Stability Pool, Rewards, and more with Sovryn's Zero protocol. Export your data to a CSV file for easy management.

emailNotificationsDialog.unconfirmedEmailWarning: Unconfirmed - check inbox for confirmation email

meta.title: Terms of service - Sovryn
meta.description: Read Sovryn's Terms of Service before using our non-custodial and decentralized services. Get informed about our policies and enjoy safe and secure usage.

meta.title: Privacy policy - Sovryn
meta.description: Protect your personal information with Sovryn's Privacy Policy. Discover how we collect, use, and safeguard your data. Enjoy peace of mind with us.

appUpdateDialog.title: New app version is available
appUpdateDialog.description: Click below to update and accept the new version.

errorPage.title: Something went wrong!
errorPage.subtitle: Please try the action again. If it continues to not work, please contact a support agent at <0>link</0>

verifiedPage.title: Email address verified!
verifiedPage.subtitle: You are now signed up for Sovryn email notifications. If you ever want to unsubscribe, you can do so using the unsubscribe link in any notification email or by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.

duplicateVerifiedPage.title: Your email address has already been verified.
duplicateVerifiedPage.subtitle: If you ever want to unsubscribe, you can do so using the unsubscribe link in any notification email or by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.

unsubscribedPage.title: Unsubscribed
unsubscribedPage.subtitle: Your email address has been unsubscribed from Sovryn email notifications regarding the specific Rootstock address associated with your unsubscribe request. You can sign up again at any time by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.

unsubscribedAllPage.title: Unsubscribed
unsubscribedAllPage.subtitle: Your email address has been unsubscribed from all Sovryn email notifications and removed from the notification system. You can sign up again at any time by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.
